channel.title: I REALY need a working Auth system [Solved]
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300]This has been solved. Thnaks Un-Named[/glow] :D
Ok, i made this AWESOME multi account neopets daily/sponsor doer with forms, but since it will someday be a pay script, I need an auth system.
I would like it so that you have to type a password into the form to use it.
Thanks, Deathader

item.title: I REALY need a working Auth system [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Contact me through msn:- niallcoates@msn.com

I will show you how to use ruler’s auth system.

item.title: I REALY need a working Auth system [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @deathader deathader
item.description:
@deathader wrote:

killa:

well if you do it all though scar they can find it you need a website that only lets scar accsess it

I was thinking of using the password thing as an include. Only people that buy it could get the include. But if you caould show me how to make an auth for a PHPbb forum, that would be even better

item.title: I REALY need a working Auth system [Solved]
item.dc:creator: @deathader deathader
item.description:
@deathader wrote:

[quote=“bullzeye, post:2, topic:48466”]Sorry, but I don’t think people will pay for a neopets script…

Just off the top of my head question: how many lines of code is it?[/quote]

So far it’s 3885 lines And i don’t need a PHP checker, all I need is a password system of some sort.

~Deathader

Read full topic
